lead_paragraph: Cleared of rape charges, the former Duke player Collin Finnerty is transferring to Loyola of Maryland. Finnerty, 21, who will play for the Greyhounds next season, released a statement yesterday saying he looked forward to finishing his college career at Loyola.Finnerty, Reade Seligmann and Dave Evans were indicted last spring on charges of rape, kidnapping and sexual offense after a woman told the police in Durham, N.C., that she was attacked by three men at a March 2006 party where she was hired to perform as a stripper.The case steadily unraveled, and North Carolina state prosecutors who eventually took over from the district attorney dropped all charges.
